title.rendered: World Cup Follow Your Team Packages

content.rendered:
Follow Your Favorite Country with a Custom World Cup Package

We realize that the perfect World Cup experience involves seeing your own team in action. Our 2018 World Cup Follow Your Team packages are your chance to guarantee your spot to witness your favorite country in round robin action. We’ll take care of everything, from hotel accommodations to inter-Russia air travel to airport and match transfers, so you can relax and focus on the matches. Of course, you’ll also have access to our experienced onsite hosts throughout your experience to help you with anything you may need while in Russia. Customize and add to your trip so that you can experience more matches, adventures, private tours and all the best that this wonderful country has to offer. Space is limited, especially for high profile teams such as Brazil, England, Japan and Mexico. Whichever team you follow, we can arrange an itinerary to secure your spot to cheer them on at this famed tournament.

Here are the 32 qualified countries:

  • Argentina
  • Australia
  • Belgium
  • Brazil
  • Colombia
  • Costa Rica
  • Croatia
  • Denmark
  • Egypt
  • England
  • France
  • Germany
  • Iceland
  • Iran
  • Japan
  • Mexico
  • Morocco
  • Nigeria
  • Panama
  • Peru
  • Poland
  • Portugal
  • Russia*
  • Saudi Arabia
  • Senegal
  • Serbia
  • South Korea
  • Spain
  • Sweden
  • Switzerland
  • Tunisia
  • Uruguay
